summary: Level 10 Lord Blackadder resides in Whiterun in Dragonreach.He will level with you, is a vampire for the fun of it, and is marriageable.
descriptionHtml:
APOLOGIES to all who wanted the real thing, but rowan Atkinson was not available to record his voice, I just wanted a char named blackadder, instead i seem to have upset people. I am so sorry. But get a life, its just fun and games

.\"I\'m being crapped on by cattle from the devil\'s own satanic herd!\"




Level 10 Lord Blackadder resides in Whiterun in Dragonreach.He will level with you, is a vampire for the fun of it, and is marriageable. He can use just about anything you give him, because...well he\'s blackadder.  Mainly Two handed to start off with, and again the voice is not right, but its the voice i like.


NEEDS DAWNGUARD TO RUN

I gave him vanilla hair so there are no issues or crashes. I know this guy does not look like Blackadder, but i did my best, its just for fun, and if you dont like it, dont download it, or better yet, you do better.

If you would like me to make Baldrick let me know.
author: Lycanheart
